about_the_game:
The year is 2257. You are a cargo pilot, Zane Black, en route from Earth to another human planet, Proximus. On the way, you receive a distress signal from the planet Novark and crash land in the middle of two alien factions in a war.

They have secrets. They are dangerous. They won't hesitate. They will kill you. You must survive.

Progress through the linear story, complete the rescue mission, and get off the planet. Utilize a large arsenal of weapons, grenades, gadgets, and vehicles to help you complete your mission. From melee to ranged and aerial, ground, and water combat, no fight is the same. With an exciting story filled with unexpected twists and turns, you will uncover the secrets of the planet Novark and unlock new mechanics along the journey.

Key Features

  • Realistic Graphics
  • Vibrant World
  • Intriguing story
  • Huge collection of weapons
  • Progressive unlocking of mechanics
  • Grenades
  • Vehicles
  • Gadgets
  • Jetpack
  • Large variety of enemies
  • Boss Fights
  • Singleplayer

content_descriptors.notes: Killing aliens and robots, guns, alien corpses

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel HD 4400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements may not be 100% accurate.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8th gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

short_description: You crash land on Novark during a rescue mission. With hostile aliens in a war, nowhere is safe and everything is out to kill you. Fight to survive. Discover secrets. Fight epic bosses. Progress through the story. Survive and escape Novark!
